field.indicator.order.duplicate: Can only have one validation rule per MARC field indicator/order.
indicator.code.code.duplicate: Can only have one validation rule per MARC field indicator/code.
Pattern.SpecificationFieldChangeDto.tag: A tag must contain three characters.
Min: {parameter} must be greater than or equal to {value}.
Max: {parameter} must be less than or equal to {value}.
Size: The ''{parameter}'' field is out of allowed bounds [{min}-{max}].
URL: The ''{parameter}'' field should be valid URL.
